  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.DataTerraformRemoteStateHttpConfig.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  &cdktf.DataTerraformRemoteStateHttpConfig {
  	Defaults: *map[string]interface{},
  	Workspace: *string,
  	Address: *string,
  	LockAddress: *string,
  	LockMethod: *string,
  	Password: *string,
  	RetryMax: *f64,
  	RetryWaitMax: *f64,
  	RetryWaitMin: *f64,
  	SkipCertVerification: *bool,
  	UnlockAddress: *string,
  	UnlockMethod: *string,
  	UpdateMethod: *string,
  	Username: *string,
  }
  ```

  ## `RetryWaitMax`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="RetryWaitMax" id="cdktf.DataTerraformRemoteStateHttpConfig.property.retryWaitMax"></a>
  
  ```go
  RetryWaitMax *f64
  ```
  
  - *Type:* *f64
  
  (Optional) The maximum time in seconds to wait between HTTP request attempts.
  
  Defaults to 30.

  Defaults to 1.
